tool_description: Fast and Reliable Job Searches on LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor, and others on Google for Jobs in Real-Time.
name: JSearch
title: JSearch

api_list.name: Search Filters
api_list.description: Accepts all **Search** endpoint parameters (except for `page` and `num_pages`) and returns the relevant filters and their estimated result counts for later use in search or for analytics.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description:
Free-form jobs search query. It is highly recommended to include job title and location as part of the query, see query examples below.

**Query examples**
- *web development in chicago*
- *marketing manager in new york via linkedin*
- *developer in germany 60306*

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description:
**[Deprecated]** Categories/industries filter - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `categories` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

**Example**: *categories=R0MxODpNYW5hZ2VtZW50,R0MwNTpBcnRGYXNoaW9uRGVzaWdu*

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Return jobs within a certain distance from location as specified as part of the query (in km).

optional_parameters.name: remote_jobs_only
optional_parameters.description:
Find remote jobs only (work from home).
Default: `false`.

optional_parameters.name: company_types
optional_parameters.description:
Company types filter - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `company_types` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

**Example**: *company_types= L2J1c2luZXNzL25haWNzMjAwNy81MjpGaW5hbmNl,L2J1c2luZXNzL25haWNzMjAwNy81MTpJbmZvcm1hdGlvbg==*

optional_parameters.name: employers
optional_parameters.description:
Employers filter - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `employers` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

**Example**: *employers= L2cvMTFoMTV4eHhydDpJbmZpbml0eSBDb25zdWx0aW5n,L2cvMTFmMDEzOXIxbjpDeWJlckNvZGVycw==*

optional_parameters.name: job_titles
optional_parameters.description:
Job title filter - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `job_titles` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

**Example**: *job_titles=c2VuaW9y,YXNzb2NpYXRl*

optional_parameters.name: job_requirements
optional_parameters.description: Find jobs with specific requirements, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `under_3_years_experience`, `more_than_3_years_experience`, `no_experience`, `no_degree`.

optional_parameters.name: date_posted
optional_parameters.description:
Find jobs posted within the time you specify.
Possible values: `all`, `today`, `3days`, `week`,`month`.
Default: `all`.

optional_parameters.name: actively_hiring
optional_parameters.description:
Find jobs at employers that are hiring a lot right now.
Default: `false`.

optional_parameters.name: employment_types
optional_parameters.description: Find jobs of particular employment types, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `FULLTIME`, `CONTRACTOR`, `PARTTIME`, `INTERN`.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for jobs posted on job sites across the web on the largest job aggregate in the world - Google for Jobs. Extensive filtering support and most options available on Google for Jobs.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description:
Free-form jobs search query. It is highly recommended to include job title and location as part of the query, see query examples below.

**Query examples**
- *web development in chicago*
- *marketing manager in new york via linkedin*
- *developer in germany 60306*

optional_parameters.name: company_types
optional_parameters.description:
Find jobs posted by companies of certain types - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `company_types` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by the **Search Filters** endpoint.

**Example**: *company_types= L2J1c2luZXNzL25haWNzMjAwNy81MjpGaW5hbmNl,L2J1c2luZXNzL25haWNzMjAwNy81MTpJbmZvcm1hdGlvbg==*

optional_parameters.name: job_titles
optional_parameters.description:
Find jobs with specific job titles - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `job_titles` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by the **Search Filters** endpoint.

**Example**: *job_titles=c2VuaW9y,YXNzb2NpYXRl*

optional_parameters.name: exclude_job_publishers
optional_parameters.description:
Exclude jobs published by specific publishers, specified as a comma (,) separated list of publishers to exclude.

**Example**: 
*exclude_job_publishers=BeeBe,Dice*

optional_parameters.name: num_pages
optional_parameters.description:
Number of pages to return, starting from `page`.
Allowed values: `1-20`.
Default: `1`.

 **Note**: requests for more than one page and up to 10 pages are charged x2 and requests for more than 10 pages are charged 3x.

optional_parameters.name: date_posted
optional_parameters.description:
Find jobs posted within the time you specify.
Allowed values: `all`, `today`, `3days`, `week`,`month`.
Default: `all`.

optional_parameters.name: remote_jobs_only
optional_parameters.description:
Find remote jobs only (work from home).
Default: `false`.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Return jobs within a certain distance from location as specified as part of the query (in km).

optional_parameters.name: actively_hiring
optional_parameters.description:
Find jobs at employers that are hiring a lot right now.
Default: `false`.

optional_parameters.name: job_requirements
optional_parameters.description: Find jobs with specific requirements, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `under_3_years_experience`, `more_than_3_years_experience`, `no_experience`, `no_degree`.

optional_parameters.name: employer
optional_parameters.description:
Find jobs posted by specific employers - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `employer` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by the **Search Filters** endpoint.

**Example**: *employers= L2cvMTFoMTV4eHhydDpJbmZpbml0eSBDb25zdWx0aW5n,L2cvMTFmMDEzOXIxbjpDeWJlckNvZGVycw==*

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description:
**[Deprecated]** Find jobs in specific categories/industries - specified as a comma (,) separated list of `categories` filter values (i.e. filter *value* field) as returned by the **Search Filters** endpoint.

**Example**: *categories=R0MxODpNYW5hZ2VtZW50,R0MwNTpBcnRGYXNoaW9uRGVzaWdu*

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Page to return (each page includes up to 10 results).
Allowed values: `1-100`.
Default: `1`.

optional_parameters.name: employment_types
optional_parameters.description: Find jobs of particular employment types, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `FULLTIME`, `CONTRACTOR`, `PARTTIME`, `INTERN`.

api_list.name: Estimated Salary
api_list.description: Get estimated salaries for a jobs around a location.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Location in which to get salary estimation.

required_parameters.name: job_title
required_parameters.description: Job title for which to get salary estimation.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description:
Search radius in km (measured from location).
Default: `200`.

api_list.name: Job Details
api_list.description: Get all job details, including additional application options / links, employer reviews and estimated salaries for similar jobs.

required_parameters.name: job_id
required_parameters.description:
Job Id of the job for which to get details. Batching of up to 20 Job Ids is supported by separating multiple Job Ids by comma (,).

Note that each Job Id in a batch request is counted as a request for quota calculation.

optional_parameters.name: extended_publisher_details
optional_parameters.description: Return additional publisher details such as website url and favicon.
